thread.title: TRUSTEES NOTICE OF SALE Pursuant to ORS 86.771, the
thread.title_full: TRUSTEES NOTICE OF SALE Pursuant to ORS 86.771, the

title: TRUSTEES NOTICE OF SALE Pursuant to ORS 86.771, the
text:
TRUSTEES NOTICE OF SALE Pursuant to ORS 86.771, the ad date: 10/10/2015 
TRUSTEES NOTICE OF SALE Pursuant to ORS 86.771, the following information is given in connection with a proposed trustee's sale with regard to the underlying trust deed recorded May 6, 2008 in the Curry County, Oregon real property records as instrument #2008-2252. 1. Names of the grantor, trustee and beneficiary in the trust deed, and the mailing address of the trustee: Grantor: Joshua H. Hensley Trustee: The original trustee on the trust deed is First American Title Ins. Co., P.O. Box 1750, Brookings, OR 97415. The Successor trustee, pursuant to "Appointment of Successor Trustee" recorded January 21, 2015 in the Curry County, Oregon real property records as instrument #2015-00172 is Paul Pierson, Attorney at Law, 16210 East Hoffeldt Lane, Brookings, OR 97415. Beneficiary: The original beneficiary on the trust deed is James F. Sheley who is now deceased. The successor beneficiary is the probate estate of James F. Shely, Curry County case #14PR103, Jimmie Sue Smith and Jenifer Bowles, co-personal representatives. (2) The property the trust deed covers is commonly known as 93040 Salal Drive, and more particularly described in Exhibit A hereto. (3) The book and page of the mortgage records that record the trust deed is Instrument #2008-2252 in Curry County, Oregon, recorded May 6, 2008. (4) The default for which the foreclosure is made is the failure of the Grantor to pay monthly installment payments and a balloon payment under the terms of an installment note dated April 21, 2008 in favor of James F. Shely in the original amount of $240,000 . (5) The sum owing on the obligation that the trust deed secures is $233,303.96 plus interest thereon at the rate of 5% per annum from October 15, 2012 until paid. (6) The property will be sold to satisfy the obligation. (7) The date, time and place of the sale is as follows: December 1, 2015 at 11:00 a.m. in the lobby of the Curry County Courthouse, 94235 Moore Street, Gold Beach, OR 97444, just inside the front entrance which faces Ellensburg Ave. (8) The right exists under ORS 86.778 (Discontinuance of foreclosure proceedings after cure of default) to have the proceeding dismissed and the trust deed reinstated by paying the entire amount then due, together with costs, trustee's fees and attorney fees, and by curing any other default complained of in the notice of default, at any time that is not later than five days before the date last set for the sale. Dated August 5, 2015 /s/Paul Pierson, OSB #88288, SuccessorTrustee 16210 E. Hoffeldt Lane, #6 Brookings, OR 97415
